entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 08:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
